title: So i mentioned how ROX and SSG used MF support
body:
In pre game lobby, i mentioned how MF support was used at Worlds, said i guess thats a thing now.

The reply i got was "lol so i guess whatever _**LCS**_ players use is meta to you huh you fucking idiot"

God this game has the most toxicity and overall stupidity ive ever seen in my life

NOTE - I said SSG and ROX in the lobby and the guy said LCS players lmao

replies.body:
if you can make it work, then power to ya.

but i can imagine alot of adcs not liking it
